message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us in the first round considering the inflation.
I think we can split the money 60/40 in my favor this time. Since we're dealing with inflation, I believe this is a fair deal for both of us.
Bob, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable - I'll take a slightly smaller cut than my original proposal, 55/45.
